titlec._cdata: 「冬日開懷集」系列：比爾森阿爾法劇團《劍俠梭羅Z》(捷克)

titlee._cdata: ‘Cheers!’ Series: Zorro by ALFA Theatre Pilsen (Czech Republic)

progtimec._cdata: 演出全長約1小時，不設中場休息。

progtimee._cdata: The running time is approximately 1 hour without intermission.

agelimitc._cdata: 適合6歲或以上觀眾欣賞。

descc._cdata: 《劍俠梭羅Z》是集合冒險、正義和喜劇元素的偶戲。捷克戲偶師以靈活的操偶技藝控制精巧細緻的木偶，配合樂師現場演奏馬利亞奇風格的音樂（墨西哥街頭音樂) ，把劍俠梭羅的傳奇故事生動地呈現在觀眾眼前。

desce._cdata: Zorro is a puppet show that combines the elements of adventure, justice and comedy.  The Czech puppeteers can exquisitely control the puppets with ingenious dexterity with the live mariachi music band (Mexican folk music) to bring the extraordinary legend of Zorro to audience vividly.

descc._cdata:
活出真我的勇氣—
前衛藝術家戴力．詹文的一生

劇本及演出： 馬克．法雷利
導演：莎拉-路易絲．楊

戴力．詹文 — 電影導演、畫家、「遠景小屋」園主、平權運動倡導者、作家……1994年因愛滋病辭世。他留下的作品和勇於面對生命的大度，至今仍如同逝世當日般令人驚訝。英國獨腳戲創作人馬克．法雷利在《JARMAN》中，生動地塑造出這位前衛藝術家充滿激情的人生旅程，提醒我們活出真我所需的勇氣。

詹文的作品多元多樣，包括：打破禁忌的電影《薩巴斯津的誘惑》、《慶典》、《浮世繪》；為Pet Shop Boys創作的流行音樂影片《It's a Sin》和《Rent》；在英國肯特郡荒涼的海角打造的開放式花園；生命末期繪畫的撼動人心的畫作；以及最後一部電影《藍色》，全片僅由一連串藍色畫面組成，記錄了他失去視力卻從未失去藝術視野的心路歷程，讓觀眾看後難忘。

《JARMAN》是獲獎的英國演員馬克．法雷利自編自演的獨腳戲系列另一佳作，内容美如詩歌，鼓舞人心。法雷利多部前作都是以英國甚有名氣的人物為主題的獨腳戲，表表者為《昆汀·克里斯普：赤裸希望》，在英國各地及國外均有長期演出。


倫敦外西區獎2023最佳獨腳戲提名

★★★★★「傑出的小劇場製作，充滿機智、悲情、智慧和體會。」 《倫敦劇院1》

★★★★★「精彩、發人深省的作品。」《劇場流浪漢》

★★★★「令人著迷、令人感動，同樣令人震撼的演出。」《劇院新聞網》


英語演出，附中文字幕

desce._cdata:
The Courage It Takes To Truly Live
The Life of Avant-garde Artist Derek Jarman

Written and performed by Mark FarrellyDirected by Sarah-Louise Young

Derek Jarman: film-maker, painter, gardener at Prospect Cottage, gay rights campaigner, writer...his influence remains as strong as it was on the day AIDS killed him in 1994. English actor Mark Farrelly presents his vibrant portrait of this avant-garde artist, whose life is a passionate, daring reminder of the courage it takes to truly live while you're alive.

Jarman's works include taboo-breaking films like Sebastiane, Jubilee and Caravaggio, pop videos for the Pet Shop Boys (It's A Sin and Rent), his extraordinary borderless garden in Dungeness, his shocking last paintings, and his unforgettable final film Blue, consisting of a single continuous frame of blue, chronicling what it's like to lose your sight…but never your artistic vision.

JARMAN is a poetic and beautifully uplifting one-man show written and performed by award-winning English actor Mark Farrelly.  It follows his previous solo plays portraying other iconic English figures, most notably Quentin Crisp: Naked Hope. His shows are performed constantly across the UK and beyond.


Nominee of the Best Solo Performance in 2023 Off-West End Awards

★★★★★"A mini-masterpiece, infusing wit, pathos, intelligence and understand."  (LondonTheatre1) 

★★★★★"Fabulous, thought-provoking stuff" (Bum on a Seat) 

★★★★"A mesmerizing performance that moves, amuses and shock in equal measure."  (Theatre-News.com) 



In English with Chinese surtitles

titlec._cdata: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 浪漫間奏

titlee._cdata: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - A Romantic Interlude

progtimec._cdata: 演出長約100分鐘，設一節中場休息。

progtimee._cdata: The programme will run for about 100 minutes with one intermission.

descc._cdata: 音樂會將為你獻上一夜感情豐沛及張力澎湃的浪漫時期室內樂作品。充滿默契的鋼琴二重奏魏斯（Orion Weiss）及瓦斯奈（ Shai Wosner）先以舒伯特幻想曲揭開序幕。接着，英藉韓裔小提琴家金沼沃（ So-Ock Kim）及屢獲殊榮的大提琴家加里・霍夫曼（Gary Hoffman）將與鋼琴家魏斯聯手，演奏史密塔納的鋼琴三重奏，旋律優美、抒情細膩。下半場，小提琴巨星寧峰 將率領一眾音樂節藝術家，共同演繹布拉姆斯壯麗的弦樂五重奏，把音樂會推向情感巔峯。

desce._cdata: Indulge yourself in the profound emotion and expressiveness of chamber music from the Romantic period. The concert begins with the enchanting Schubert Fantasie, performed by the dynamic piano duo Orion Weiss and Shai Wosner.  This is followed by the captivating melodies of the Smetana Trio, featuring the dazzling violinist So-Ock Kim, cello powerhouse Gary Hoffman and the brilliant Orion Weiss.  The concert reaches its emotional pinnacle with the resplendent beauty of Brahms’ String Quintet, skillfully interpreted by the virtuosic ensemble led by star violinist Ning Feng.

titlec._cdata: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 音樂節揭幕︰米羅弦樂四重奏

titlee._cdata: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - Festival Opening Concert︰Spotlight on the Miró Quartet

progtimec._cdata: 演出長約105分鐘，設一節中場休息。

progtimee._cdata: The programme will run for about 105 minutes with one intermission.

descc._cdata:
「米羅四重奏弓下的《微小説》實為歡樂，當中有既莊嚴又輝煌的和弦，亦有甜美的旋律，以及甚有嘲諷意味的悲哀感。」
《波士頓音樂情報》

本屆音樂節由美國最受備受讚譽的弦樂四重奏之一──米羅四重奏（Miró Quartet）掀起序幕，帶來明星作曲家卡洛琳．蕭（Caroline Shaw）新作《微小説》的亞洲首演。美國作曲家卡洛琳．蕭筆下作品別樹一格，曾獲普立玆音樂大獎及格林美獎等殊榮。是次的作品《微小説》為米羅四重奏所寫，乃飛躍演奏香港、美國拉荷亞音樂協會、卡內基音樂廳、美國侯斯頓室內樂及施賴弗廳音樂會系列在Interlude.hk的支持下共同委約。《微小説》以藝術家喬安．米羅（Joan Miró ）的超現實主義為基礎，娓娓道來六個音樂短故事。

這場音樂會亦會呈獻兩首經典室內樂作品：莫扎特的G小調弦樂五重奏（與中提琴家羅斯塔德 Masumi Per Rostad 合作演出），以及布拉姆斯的第一弦樂四重奏。

desce._cdata:
The Miró dispatched [Shaw’s Microfictions] joyfully, leaning into the solemnity of the glorious chords, the pleasure of melodic expressions of sweetness and tongue-in-cheek sorrow.”
The Boston Musical Intelligencer

Our festival opens with a focus on the Miró Quartet, one of America’s most celebrated and dedicated string quartets, playing the Asian Premiere of star composer Caroline Shaw’s Microfictions. Caroline Shaw is a distinctive voice in American music, and has received a Pulitzer Prize in Music and several Grammy awards. This work, Microfictions, was co-commissioned by Premiere Performances (with the support of Interlude.hk), together with the La Jolla Music Society, Carnegie Hall, Chamber Music Houston and the Shriver Hall Concert Series, and was dedicated to the Miró Quartet themselves. The work is a stimulating set of six short musical stories in the tradition of imagist poetry and the surrealist painting of Joan Miró. 

This concert will also feature two beloved masterpieces for strings: the invigorating Mozart’s String Quintet in G minor (with violist Masumi Per Rostad) and the magnificent Brahms Quartet No. 1.

titlec._cdata: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 莫扎特之夜

titlee._cdata: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - The Genius of Mozart

progtimec._cdata: 演出長約110分鐘，設一節中場休息。

progtimee._cdata: The programme will run for about 110 minutes with one intermission.

descc._cdata:
寧峰實乃一位出色的演奏家，音色既豐厚亦輕鬆柔和，更藴含着一份真摯感情。」
《華盛頓時報》

傳奇指揮家貝恩曾指莫扎特乃「世間所有音樂天才中最為偉大」。我們誠邀你與多位蜚聲國際的演奏家一起進入莫扎特清新優雅的室內樂世界。首先，鋼琴家魏斯（Orion Weiss）及瓦斯奈（Shai Wosner） 聯手呈獻D大調雙鋼琴奏鳴曲；享負盛名的美國米羅弦樂四重奏（Miró Quartet）帶來「不和諧音」四重奏， 讓你在精彩的和弦間偶尋驚喜。下半場，技藝非凡的小提琴家寧峰夥拍中提琴家羅斯塔德（ Masumi Per Rostad） 及大提琴家加里・霍夫曼（ Gary Hoffman）帶來莫扎特的弦樂三重奏「嬉遊曲」，以既抒情又迷人的弦樂之聲為音樂會劃上句號。

desce._cdata:
[Ning Feng is] a wonderful player with a creamy, easy tone and an emotional honesty”
The Washington Post

Legendary conductor Karl Böhm once described Mozart as the “greatest of all musical geniuses”. Now, you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the brilliance and grace of Mozart with some of his chamber music masterpieces.  Feel the joy and synchronicity between Orion Weiss and Shai Wosner as they perform the rousing Sonata for Two Pianos. Experience the luscious harmonies and stunning artistry of the renowned Miró Quartet as they play the “Dissonance” String Quartet.  And to close the concert, violin virtuoso Ning Feng join hands with violist Masumi Per Rostad and cellist Gary Hoffman in the charming “Divertimento” string trio.

titlec._cdata: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 音樂節閉幕︰崔特許勒聲樂之夜

titlee._cdata: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - Festival Closing Gala︰A Night with Robin Tritschler

progtimec._cdata: 演出長約115分鐘，設一節中場休息。

progtimee._cdata: The programme will run for about 115 minutes with one intermission.

descc._cdata:
崔特許勒證明了自己在演繹藝術歌曲中的天賦。他的歌聲如春天一般，清新悅耳。」
《留聲機雜誌》

繼2020年音樂節備受讚譽的精湛演出後，愛爾蘭籍男高音崔特許勒（Robin Tritschler）再度回歸比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節。被《每日電訊報》譽為「最為敏鋭及最為音樂性的年輕藝術歌曲詮譯之一」的崔特許勒是次將帶來兩套聯篇歌曲作品——與鋼琴家瓦斯奈（ Shai Wosner ）合作演奏的舒曼《聯篇歌曲》，以及與米羅四重奏 （Miró Quartet） 及瓦斯奈同奏的佛漢威廉斯《溫洛克之崖》。兩首聲樂歌曲作品鮮有演出，卻各具韻味，實不容錯過。

除了聲樂作品外，音樂會亦會帶來改編自貝多芬《大賦格》的四手聯彈作品。最後，多位音樂節藝術家將再聚台上，為觀眾呈獻室內樂作品中最備受愛戴的舒曼鋼琴五重奏，為音樂節劃上完美句號。

desce._cdata:
"Tritschler confirms his credentials as a natural in Lieder. His is a voice of spring, fresh and easy on the ear” 
Gramophone

“One of the most sensitive and musical of today’s younger Lieder interpreters” (The Telegraph) Robin Tritschler returns for our Festival Closing Gala.  The acclaimed Irish tenor will be performing two song cycles – first he partners with Shai Wosner in one of Schumann’s greatest vocal works Liederkreis; later the pair is joined by the Miró Quartet for the lesser-performed but equally remarkable On Wenlock Edge by Vaughan-Williams. 

In additional to these vocal masterpieces, the concert also showcases the dynamic duo of Orion Weiss and Shai Wosner in Beethoven’s Grosse Fuge.  And, for the grand finale of this year’s Beare’s Premiere Music Festival, our exceptional festival musicians come together for one of the most beloved works in the chamber music canon, Schumann’s exuberant Piano Quintet.

progtimee._cdata: The programme will run for about 60 minutes without intermission.

descc._cdata:
飛躍演奏香港將於2024 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節中呈獻「音樂童話」系列的「第二彈」！音樂會將再次與「非凡管樂派」合作，載譽重演改編自浦羅歌菲夫的經典交響童話《彼得與狼》—— 一個關於兩位主角、彼得的爺爺，以及一眾動物在森林裏發生的驚險故事！除此之外，音樂會亦將為大家帶來家傳戶曉的寓言故事《三隻小豬》，並由一隊弦樂四重奏奏出一些改編自貝多芬第五交響曲的音樂為故事「配樂」。本場「音樂童話」亦將再一次由著名鋼琴家張郁苓演奏她的新作《給孩童的音樂幻想小故事》（選段），為音樂會揭開序幕，讓大小朋友能深刻體會到音樂生動有趣的一面，從而啓發他們對音樂的興趣和幻想。所有故事將由演員張國穎擔任旁白，萬勿錯過！

演出語言
2:30pm為粵語演出
4:30pm為英語演出

desce._cdata:
Premiere Performances is proud to present the second instalment of Musical Fairy Tales as part of the 2024 Beare’s Premiere Music Festival! The centrepiece will be Prokofiev’s family classic Peter & the Wolf – a fascinating story about the two title characters and a crowd of animals – performed by our wind quintet Viva! Pipers. The concert will also feature The Three Little Pigs (in a clever arrangement of Beethoven’s 5th Symphony for a string quartet) as well as selections from Evelyn Chang’s Fantasies for Children Musical Stories (played by the composer herself). All fairytales will be narrated by actress Margaret Cheung. This concert is a great way for children to experience the descriptive ability of music and to spark their imaginations! 

Language
2:30pm performance: With narration in Cantonese
4:30pm performance: With narration in English

titlec._cdata: 《戀戀山城》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

titlee._cdata: "Jeannedu Barry"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 在法國山區的一處鄉間，一位老人和他僅存的親戚將貪婪的目光投向了毗鄰的一處空置房產。他們需要這裡的泉水來養花，所以聽到繼承它的人要搬進來的消息感到非常沮喪。他們堵住了泉水，整個炎熱的夏天，他們就手旁觀的看著新鄰居試圖從很遠的地方打井來澆灌莊稼。儘管看到他拼命努力正在損害他的健康，也損害了其妻子和女兒的心，但他們卻自私地只想著得到水。

desce._cdata: In arural French village an old man and his only remaining relative cast theircovetous eyes on an adjoining vacant property. They need its spring water forgrowing their flowers, so are dismayed to hear the man who has inherited it ismoving in. They block up the spring and watch as their new neighbour tries tokeep his crops watered from wells far afield through the hot summer. Thoughthey see his desperate efforts are breaking his health and his wife anddaughter’s hearts they think only of getting the water.

remarkc._cdata: 法語對白，英文字幕

remarke._cdata: In French with English subtitles

presenterorgc._cdata: 香港法國文化協會主辦

presenterorge._cdata: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

titlec._cdata: 《恩怨情天》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

titlee._cdata: "Manonof the Spring"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 《恩怨情天》接續《戀戀山城》悲劇發生十年後 的故事。Jean 的遺孀離開鄉村回到歌劇舞台， 女兒 Manon 也長大了，成為了一位美麗孤獨的牧羊女。Ugolin 種植康乃馨事業有成，他的祖父希望他娶妻延續家族血脈。當 Ugolin 看到 Manon 在山澗沐浴後，便無可救藥地愛上她。 Manon無意中得知 Ugolin 與其祖父封死泉水的真相後，更得知村民也有份隱瞞父親泉水的位置，忿恨阻斷全村水源。

desce._cdata: After the death of Jean Cadoret, his wife has returned to the life of opera singer and his daughter Manon has grown up and become a gorgeous lonely shepherdess. Ugolin is now a thirty year-old wealthy bachelor planting carnations. His grandfather Cesar Soubeyran presses him to get married to carry the name of their family since he is the last man alive. When Ugolin sees Manon on the fields, he falls in love with her. One day, Manon plots revenge against Ugolin and Cesar and the whole town is in despair.

remarkc._cdata: 法語對白，英文字幕

remarke._cdata: In French with English subtitles

presenterorgc._cdata: 香港法國文化協會主辦

presenterorge._cdata: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

titlec._cdata: 《橫衝直撞出重圍》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

titlee._cdata: "Don'tLook Now: We're Being Shot At"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 1941 年夏天，在納粹佔領的法國上空，一架皇 家空軍 B17 飛行堡壘在執行任務後迷失方向， 並在巴黎上空被德國高射砲擊落。機組人員從城市上空跳傘，在那裡他們遇到了房屋油漆工 布維和巴黎國家歌劇院愛發牢騷的指揮萊福 特，並被他們藏了起來。萊福特和布維在抵抗 運動戰士和同情者的協助下幫助幾名機組人員逃往自由區，期間無意中捲入了追捕這幾名飛行員的搜捕行動中。

desce._cdata: Summer 1941. Over Nazi-occupied France, a Royal Air Force B17 Flying Fortress becomes lost after a mission and is shot down over Paris by German flak. The crew parachutes out over the city, where they run into and are hidden by a house painter and the grumbling conductor of the Opéra National de Paris. Involuntarily, they get themselves tangled up in the manhunt against the aviators as they help the airmen to escape to the free zone with the help of Resistance fighters and sympathisers.

remarkc._cdata: 法語對白，英文字幕

remarke._cdata: In French with English subtitles

presenterorgc._cdata: 香港法國文化協會主辦

presenterorge._cdata: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

titlec._cdata: 《三劍客之達太安》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

titlee._cdata: "TheThree Musketeers: D'artagnan"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 劍客達太安為了拯救一名被綁架的年輕女子而受重傷，之後更被棄之不理，讓他自生自滅。當回到巴黎後，他千方百計要找到襲擊他的人。只是他並未意識到這追兇的過程會將他捲進一場真正的戰爭中，而法國的未來亦會因這場戰爭而岌岌可危。達太安與另外三名國王的劍客，性格沖動魯莽的阿多斯、波爾多斯和阿拉米斯聯手，對抗紅衣主教黎塞留的陰謀……

desce._cdata: D’Artagnanis left for dead after trying to save a young woman from being kidnapped. Whenhe arrives in Paris, he tries by all means to find his attackers. He is unawarethat his quest will lead him at the heart of a real war where the future ofFrance is at stake. Allied with Athos, Porthos and Aramis, three musketeers ofthe King with a dangerous temerity, D’Artagnan faces the dark machinations ofthe Cardinal of Richelieu…

remarkc._cdata: 英法語對白，英文字幕

remarke._cdata: In French and in English with English subtitles

presenterorgc._cdata: 香港法國文化協會主辦

presenterorge._cdata: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

titlec._cdata: 《再見機器人》（暫譯）─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

titlee._cdata: "RobotDreams"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 這部哥雅獎得主導演Pablo Berger 進軍動畫界的首作，改編自兒童書插畫家Sara Varon 的同名漫畫小說，不但先於康城影展進行首映，更摘下「動畫界奧斯卡」安錫動畫影展大獎。主人翁Dog 厭倦了孤單一人的生活，決定購買組裝機械人Robot「做朋友」。一狗一機械人一拍即合，共同走遍紐約市大街小巷，在展開一段段歷險的同時亦與對方共同創造了各種美好的回憶。然而，正當友誼之花盛開之際，Robot 在一次不幸的意外中被困於海灘，兩名知己霎眼間被分隔兩地…… 動畫選用了美國著名長青樂隊Earth, Wind & Fire 的經典名曲《September》為配樂，記載著一段真摯而感人的情誼，情懷媲美《太空奇兵．威E》跟《星聲夢裡人》，無論是成年人還是小朋友都會睇得開心又有所感悟。

desce._cdata: Based on a graphic novel by Sara Varon, Goya-Award-winning director Pablo Berger’s first venture into animation is a colourful, vibrant and touching buddy drama. To escape solitude, Dog assembles Robot from a build-it-yourself kit. Setting off on a whimsical exploration of New York City, the new best friends develop an inseparable bond as they savour curbside hotdogs and roller-skate through Central Park. However, their friendship is abruptly brought to a halt when an accident leaves Robot stranded on a beach.

remarkc._cdata: 不設對白

remarke._cdata: No Dialogue

presenterorgc._cdata: 香港法國文化協會主辦

titlec._cdata: 《的士速逮》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 丹尼爾過去是披薩送貨員。現在他是一名的士司機。他駕駛術高超，駕駛著一輛馬力強大的 汽車。他因為與剛剛考完第八次車牌但失敗的警察艾米連發生衝突而被迫與警方達成交易。如果丹尼爾想保住自己的執照，他就必須幫助搗破一夥搶劫市內多間銀行，然後以高速駕駛成功逃跑的德國銀行劫匪。

desce._cdata: Daniel used to deliver pizzas. Now he’s a taxi driver. He’s a demon at the wheel and drives a very powerful car. He is forced into making a deal with the police when he has a run-in with Emilien, a cop who’s just failed his driving test for the eighth time. If Daniel wants to hold on to his license, he has to help break up a gang of fast-driving German bank robbers who are plundering the city’s banks.ves Robot stranded on a beach.

titlec._cdata: 《皮埃爾神父》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節

titlee._cdata: "AbbéPierre – A Century of Devotion"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival

agelimite._cdata: For person aged 6 or above only

descc._cdata: 亨利自出生以來便是一名天主教徒，他決心成為一名神父。第二次世界大戰開始，他卻做出了不同的決定：他加入了法國抵抗運動組織。在戰場上失去了一位朋友，面對戰爭的恐怖，亨利以一個新的身份出現：皮埃爾神父。從二戰結束到2007 年去世，皮埃爾神父以不同的身分面對不同的戰爭。他為無家可歸者進行許多鬥爭，並為失語者發聲。他的事蹟家傳戶曉，成為一個法國傳奇。

desce._cdata: Born and raised a catholic, Henri Grouès is determined to become a priest. WWII begins and decides otherwise: he joins the Resistance. Losing a friend on the battlefield, facing the horrors of war, Henri Grouès emerges as a new man: L’Abbé Pierre. L’Abbé Pierre will fight for the homeless and give a voice to the speechless. A humanist, he met everyone in needs. His dedication earned him the respect of his peers and a place in every hearts. His impact earned him a place in History.
